Matrix Distance-IDX

This output has a matrix structure where in the first column are indicated the name of the protein, while in the other columns specifies a distance value (Euclidean, Minkowsky or Manhattan) for the protein compared to the other, in terms of a previously calculated indices (after standardization). The last lines print the descriptors that were eliminated because of containing missing values (-9999).

Output Matrix Distance-IDX

ProtDCal Protein Descriptor Calculation
